name: Between Worlds (First Slime Games, Myatezhny, protosev)
name_original: Between Worlds (First Slime Games, Myatezhny, protosev)
description:
Mushy returns to her forest but her people are gone and strange ruins have appeared where her village used to be. Now the world seems to be shifting as she try to uncover whats going on in the forest.

Made for the Mini Jam 90: illusion

How to play

WASD - Move

Spacebar - Jump/Advance dialog

Shift - Alternate between worlds

Authors

Programming: Pascal Boardman (Protosev) Twitter

Arts: Marianne Richard Instagram

Made with Godot!
